attributes.action:
Introduce operator licence for 3.5t couriers.
And tacho. Rules
attributes.additional_details:
Around the UK van drivers are undercutting the transport industry.
Pulling work away from hauliers who run by the law using tacho rules. 
There are van drivers who break tge law on a daily basis.
While Hgv drivers have run under WTD and tacho ruels. 
Also requierd 6 weekly maintenance checks.
Van drivers can set up a courier company with no need to provide a operator license.
attributes.background:
Make into law 3.5t van drivers have the same requirements as hgv drivers.
WTD 
Drivers hours
6/8 weekly checks on the vehicles
Financial standing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like limits for all van drivers up the limit of 3.5 tonnes, or only for specific 3.5 tonne vans. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
